name: Marin County Behavioral Health Provider Directory
description: Marin County Behavioral Health and Recovery Services' official provider directory, including Medi-Cal mental health providers and Drug Medi-Cal substance use treatment facilities.
fullDescription: Marin County Behavioral Health and Recovery Services' official provider directory, including Medi-Cal mental health providers and Drug Medi-Cal substance use treatment facilities.
whatTheyOffer:
- Medi-Cal mental health provider listings
- Drug Medi-Cal substance use providers
- Community mental health services
- Crisis intervention resources
- Recovery support services
howToGetIt: View the online provider directories or call the Access Line at 888-818-1115 for help finding mental health and substance use services in Marin County.
keywords: Marin, San Rafael, mental health, substance use, provider directory, therapist, counselor, drug treatment, Medi-Cal, Drug Medi-Cal, clinic
